00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Function: NewComponentPage()
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 NewComponentPage::NewComponentPage(LibraryInterface* libInterface,
00034                                    QWidget* parentDlg) : libInterface_(libInterface), vlnvEditor_(0),
00035                                                          attributeEditor_(0), directoryEdit_(0)
00036 {
00037     // Create the title and description labels labels.
00038     QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New Component"), this);
00039     
00040     QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00041     font.setPointSize(12);
00042     font.setBold(true);
00043     titleLabel->setFont(font);
00044 
00045     QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a flat (non-hierarchical) component"), this);
00046 
00047     // Create the attribute editor.
00048     attributeEditor_ = new KactusAttributeEditor(this);
00049     connect(attributeEditor_, SIGNAL(productHierarchyChanged()), this, SLOT(onProductHierarchyChanged()));
00050 
00051     // Create the VLNV editor.
00052     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(VLNV::COMPONENT, libInterface, parentDlg, this, true);
00053     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00054     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00055 
00056     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00057     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00058 
00059     QSettings settings;
00060     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00061     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00062     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00063 
00064     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00065     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00066     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00067     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00068     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00069     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00070 
00071     // Setup the layout.
00072     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00073     layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00074     layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00075     layout->addSpacing(12);
00076     layout->addWidget(attributeEditor_);
00077     layout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00078     layout->addSpacing(12);
00079     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00080     layout->addStretch(1);
00081 
00082     onProductHierarchyChanged();
00083 }

00090 }

00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 // Function: selectDirectory()
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void NewComponentPage::selectDirectory()
00096 {
00097     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00098                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00099 
00100     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00101     {
00102         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Function: prevalidate()
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 bool NewComponentPage::prevalidate() const
00110 {
00111     return (vlnvEditor_->isValid() && !directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00112 }
00113 
00114 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // Function: validate()
00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 bool NewComponentPage::validate()
00118 {
00119     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00120 
00121     // Check if the VLNV already exists.
00122     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnvEditor_->getVLNV()))
00123     {
00124         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00125                            tr("The component cannot be created because the VLNV already exists in the library."),
00126                            QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00127         msgBox.exec();
00128         return false;
00129     }
00130 
00131     return true;
00132 }
00133 
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 // Function: apply()
00136 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 void NewComponentPage::apply()
00138 {
00139     emit createComponent(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy(),
00140                          attributeEditor_->getFirmness(),
00141                          vlnvEditor_->getVLNV(), directoryEdit_->text());
00142 }
00143 
00144 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 // Function: onPageChange()
00146 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 bool NewComponentPage::onPageChange()
00148 {
00149     // Discard the VLNV and reset the attributes.
00150     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV());
00151     attributeEditor_->setAttributes(KactusAttribute::KTS_GLOBAL, KactusAttribute::KTS_TEMPLATE);
00152     onProductHierarchyChanged();
00153     return true;
00154 }
00155 
00156 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 // Function: onProductHierarchyChanged()
00158 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00159 void NewComponentPage::onProductHierarchyChanged()
00160 {
00161     // Update the VLNV's library field if it is either empty or any of the predefined ones.
00162     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00163     
00164     if (vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00165     {
00166         vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00167     }
00168     else
00169     {
00170         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODHIER_COUNT; ++i)
00171         {
00172             if (vlnv.getLibrary().toLower() ==
00173                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(static_cast<KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy>(i)).toLower())
00174             {
00175                 vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00176                 break;
00177             }
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(vlnv);
00182 }
00183 
00184 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 // Function: updateDirectory()
00186 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187 void NewComponentPage::updateDirectory()
00188 {
00189     QSettings settings;
00190     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00191 
00192     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00193 
00194     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00195     {
00196         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00197 
00198         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00199         {
00200             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00201 
00202             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00203             {
00204                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00205 
00206                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00207                 {
00208                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00209                 }
00210             }
00211         }
00212     }
00213 
00214     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00215 }
